advancement.eschatology.kill_apostle_wei:
Deliver the final blow to a Goety Apostle while bearing the Potato's Curse.
...Look, the Apostle is crying.
item.eschatology.awe_contempt.desc2: Applies Gaze to enemies on hit. Right-click to collect Contempt, converting Gaze into Contempt of Gaze.
item.eschatology.awe_contempt.desc3: If hit by a Fell Bullet, activates 'Shoot / Whenever'.
item.eschatology.magic_bullet.desc2: Hold right-click to charge and release to fire a high-power projectile that pierces allies. Standard attacks consume a magic bullet to create an explosion and set the target on fire.
item.eschatology.fell_bullet_weapon.desc: Hold right-click to charge, then release to fire a fell bullet that automatically strikes the target a second time upon impact.
item.eschatology.the_once_and_future_gun: When equipped in the belt slot, it automatically pursues nearby enemies.
item.eschatology.revenge_ledger.desc2: Record the enemies that attack you in the "Revenge Ledger." Each time you attack a recorded enemy, 10% of "Revenge" accumulates. When it reaches 100%, right-click to use "My Hair Coupon!!!"
item.eschatology.magic_bullet.desc: "It really is as you say; this is a magic bullet that will never miss."
item.eschatology.fell_bullet_weapon.desc: "Leg it, if you want. My scattering bullets…will turn your brain into fireworks no matter where you run."
advancements.eschatology.boss.root.title: Eschatology
advancements.eschatology.boss.summon_bla: Summon the End, the Foam, and the Nothing at the Altar of the Eclipse
advancements.eschatology.boss.kill_black: Repelling the End, Ephemerality, and Nothingness
What will you accomplish in this fleeting life?
advancements.eschatology.boss.kill_exo_w: The ones who know the cruelty of winter and the aroma of rose
Roses and snow palaces fall, and no one remembers the woman who slept there.
advancements.eschatology.eclipse_vault_e: Time to uncover the secrets hidden in The Frozen Vault
guide.frozen_exo.flint: I think I can do something with a flint and steel.
guide.alter.time: ...? Nothing happened, try it when it's sunny and not night.
guide.alter.nether_star: I'll try offering a Nether Star, maybe something will happen.
item.eschatology.frozen_exoheart.desc: The heart of the XF-07P, it contains cold air and tremendous vitality.
item.eschatology.witchs_crest_level: Number of potatoes eaten so far:
guide.potato.donteat: My body rejects anything other than potatoes...
item.eschatology.witchs_crest_desc: "Anyone who touches potatoes will become a witch!"
item.eschatology.apocalypse_desc: Once upon a time, three happy birds lived in a warm and lush forest.
item.eschatology.apocalypse_desc2: When attacking, it deals damage in four attributes: Red, Black, White, and Pale.
item.eschatology.a_time_crystal_desc: Fragments of something that has traveled forever through time and space hold many possibilities, but are difficult to process.
item.eschatology.frosted_scarp_desc: Part of the XF-07P Revenant's exterior, its tough exterior freezes anything it touches.
item.eschatology.haetataki.desc1: A fly swatter with incredible power, turning most mobs to dust with one swing.
item.eschatology.haetataki.desc2: Caution: Shaking this may shatter your screen
item.eschatology.haetataki.lore: "This has always been present in broken worlds. Does it have that much power?"
death.attack.red: %1$s was impaled by the apocalyptic power of %2$s.
death.attack.white: %1$s has been unleashed by the apocalyptic magic of %2$s.
death.attack.black: %1$s had his soul torn apart by %2$s.
death.attack.pale: %1$s was imploded by the force of %2$s.
